Are you a fool?
Wooxy is totally safe until now.
Although I stopped using it since it's buggy as hell for me.

If a custom skin copies an ACTUAL existing Riot skin, that's a definite punishment, more than likely a permanent suspension.
If it's a skin that doesn't copy Riot's skins, it's still a gray area depending on what their system picks up and how the program affects the game client.

In my opinion.... risking a potential punishment just because you want to use some free skins from a third party program is definitely not even worth the risk. Potentially losing your account and all the runes, rune pages, mastery points, ladder rank, any already owned skins, and unlocked champs just for wanting to use a custom skin doesn't seem worth it at all.
